Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Trish
Reviews.Content: As owner of another Samsung, I expected and received another high quality HGTV.  Picture and sound are excellent.  You will need to adjust the color settings to your liking, but again no big deal.  HIghly recommend.

ProductInfo.Features:
Full HD 1080p - The realistic detail of Full HD images invites you to enjoy a viewing experience that redefines reality
SRS TheaterSound® HD
ConnectShareTM Movie lets you watch videos, play music or view photos from a USB connection without needing to use a PC or special equipment
2 HDMI Connections
ENERGY STAR V 5.3 Compliant
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN46EH5050 46" Class LED 5050 Series TV
